hero.title: Global Crypto Exchange
hero.subtitle: Trusted Worldwide
hero.description: Professional cryptocurrency exchange operating in major cities worldwide. Instant crypto-to-crypto, crypto-to-fiat, and fiat-to-crypto exchanges with competitive rates and 24/7 support.

globalCoverage.title: Global Coverage
globalCoverage.description: Operating in major cities worldwide with local payment methods and support

instantExchange.title: Instant Exchange
instantExchange.description: Lightning-fast crypto exchanges with real-time rates and minimal fees

bankGradeSecurity.title: Bank-Grade Security
bankGradeSecurity.description: 99.9% uptime, cold storage, and 24/7 monitoring for maximum security

smartTrading.title: Smart Trading
smartTrading.description: Advanced algorithms for optimal rates and automated portfolio management

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.subtitle: Instant crypto trading
exchange.youHave1Hour: You have 1 hour to send funds. Request expires at
exchange.sendExactAmountDesc: Send exactly {amount} {currency}. Incorrect amount may result in loss of funds!
exchange.fundsSent: Your funds have been successfully sent to the specified address

cryptoFiat.title: Crypto ⇄ Fiat
cryptoFiat.subtitle: Cryptocurrency to cash exchange
cryptoFiat.howItWorksDescription: After submitting your request, our operator will contact you to coordinate exchange details. We only work in specified cities and guarantee transaction security.
cryptoFiat.requestSubmittedDescription: Your exchange request has been received. We will contact you shortly through the provided contact method.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: CryptoXchange respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.dataCollectionDesc: We collect only necessary information to provide our services.
privacy.dataUsageDesc: Your data is used exclusively for transaction processing and service improvement.
privacy.dataProtectionDesc: We use modern encryption methods to protect your data.
privacy.contactUsDesc: If you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: By using CryptoXchange services, you agree to the following terms.
terms.servicesDesc: We provide cryptocurrency and fiat currency exchange services.
terms.userObligationsDesc: Users must provide accurate information and comply with laws.
terms.liabilityDesc: CryptoXchange is not responsible for losses related to market risks.
terms.changesDesc: We reserve the right to change these terms with prior notice.

language.welcomeDesc: To start using our service, click the button below.
